verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> coming down <S%G2597><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of the abyss <S%G12><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> chain <S%G254><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid hold <S%G2902><s%> on the dragon <S%G1404><s%>, the old <S%G744><s%> serpent <S%G3789><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Devil <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the abyss <S%G12><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shut <S%G2808><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, <S%G2808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> it over <S%G1883><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> more <S%G2089><s%>, until <S%G891><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> should be finished <S%G5055><s%>: <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must be <S%G1163><s%> loosed <S%G3089><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> time <S%G5550><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they sat <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I saw the souls <S%G5590><s%> of them that had been beheaded <S%G3990><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G3748><s%> as <S%G4352><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> forehead <S%G3359><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they lived <S%G2198><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> The rest <S%G3062><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> lived <S%G326><s%> not3756, 326 until <S%G2193><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> should be finished <S%G5055><s%>. This <S%G3778><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> is he that hath <S%G2192><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>: over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> they shall be <S%G2071><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall reign <S%G936><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> are finished <S%G5055><s%>, Satan <S%G4567><s%> shall be loosed <S%G3089><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> shall come forth <S%G1831><s%> to deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> which are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, Gog <S%G1136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Magog <S%G3098><s%>, to gather <S%G4863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the war <S%G4171><s%>: the number <S%G706><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> is as <S%G5613><s%> the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they went up <S%G305><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the breadth <S%G4114><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> compassed <S%G2944><s%> the camp <S%G3925><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> about <S%G2944><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the beloved <S%G25><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> came down2597, 575, 2316 out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> that deceived <S%G4105><s%> them <S%G846><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> are also the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the false prophet <S%G5578><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they shall be tormented <S%G928><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> fled away <S%G5343><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> for them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, the great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the small <S%G3398><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2316><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> books <S%G975><s%> were opened <S%G455><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> book <S%G975><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the book of life <S%G2222><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> were judged <S%G2919><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> which were written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the books <S%G975><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> gave up <S%G1325><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> that were in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> gave up <S%G1325><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> that were in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they were judged <S%G2919><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> were cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>. This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, even the lake of fire.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> was <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, he was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>.
